title: Ep 129: Your Body is Hideous and so is Everyone Else's (Mostly)
description: This episode I answer emails about body issues. It's summer time and the fatness comes out to play! How can we deal with hating our bodies? And isn't everyone beautiful in their own special way??? The power went out in my neighborhood and chaos ensued. Also, how can we deal with the fear of failure? I have an idea or two!
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
